     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17344494">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344494">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344494">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344494">
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Rachel Hamelers
           </strong>
           <br />
           Reference Librarian, Science subject specialist
           <br />
           phone: x3601
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           IM: (AIM) rachelhamelers
           <br />
           Reference desk IM: talktotrexler
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17344494" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17344725">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344725">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344725">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Where can I go for brainstorming and narrowing a topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344725">
          <div id="boxatt17344725" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20416505">
              <a id="link_20416505" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416505,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Trexler Library, Online Reference Shelf)
               <br />
               Credo Reference provides access to 325 reference works, including general and subject specific dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from over 60 respected publishers across 17 major subject areas--all online, all searchable from one search box. Search across all sources or search or browse within a single reference work.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20416511">
              CQ Researcher
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Trexler Library, level A, Reference 300.97305 C882r)
               <br />
               This monthly periodical devotes each issue to a topic of public concern, presenting opposing viewpoints and overview and history of the topic.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20416543">
              <a id="link_20416543" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416543,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A good source for brainstorming for ideas, and narrowing a topic. A communally-edited site. Non-scholarly. Compare this resource to Scholarpedia (http://www.scholarpedia.org/).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17344783">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344783">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344783">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find authoritative websites containing expert testimony, statistics, and examples?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344783">
          <div id="boxatt17344783" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20416554">
              <a id="link_20416554" href="http://www.intute.ac.uk/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416554,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19995317}); ">
               Intute
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Not perfect, but a starting place to locate sites that are more authoritative.
               <br />
               Researcher beware. Scrutinize for a) author credentials and b) institutional affiliation
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17344794">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344794">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344794">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate legislation histories?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344794">
          <div id="boxatt17344794" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20416569">
              <a id="link_20416569" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416569,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search on your topic, adding the phrase law or legislation. Watch especially for the publications CQ Researcher or CQ Weekly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20416586">
              CQ Almanac
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Trexler Library level A, Reference 328.73 C749)
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17344821">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344821">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344821">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find scholarly books and government documents containing statements of fact, expert testimony, and examples?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344821">
          <div id="boxatt17344821" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17344833">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344833">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344833">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate periodical articles, especially peer-reviewed (scholarly) journal articles containing facts, expert testimony, and examples?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344833">
          <div id="boxatt17344833" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20416621">
              <a id="link_20416621" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416621,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 4000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20416816">
              <a id="link_20416816" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416816,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19995311}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An index to books and to articles with bibliographies--many of them scholarly, but not all. Some links to full text--especially non-English. Use in conjunction with a journal title search in the library catalog, or request articles on interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20416823">
              <a id="link_20416823" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416823,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes extensive full text, from both popular and scholarly periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17344949">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344949">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344949">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate statistical data?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344949">
          <p>
           For more resources look at the recommended resources on Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385">
            Statistics and Data Help Page
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            For Subject specific databases look at
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu">
             Subject Guides
            </a>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17344949" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20416835">
              <a id="link_20416835" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416835,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808343}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Easy-to-use access point to U.S. Census data.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20416843">
              <a id="link_20416843" href="http://www.census.gov/compendia/statab/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20416843,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Basic Speech', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808395}); ">
               Statistical Abstract of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Summary of most statistical data produced by the U.S. government.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4707583" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17344967">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344967">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344967">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I cite my sources in the APA format?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344967">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, go to
           <i>
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
             Citation Guides
            </a>
           </i>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17344967" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17344977">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17344977">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17344977">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17344977">
          <p>
           <span class="style5">
            Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be requested by going to the&nbsp;
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
             interlibrary loan
            </a>
            section of the
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
             Trexler Library Homepage
            </a>
            .
           </span>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17344977" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
     <div id="footer_topline">
